entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 07 at 5:17AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG WINDS FRIDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY... Northeast winds sustained 20 to 35 mph, with gusts up to 45 mph, will return Friday afternoon and continue through the overnight hours before slowly diminishing Saturday. These winds are then expected to increase again late Saturday evening and continue through Sunday before diminishing by Monday morning. Loose debris
